title: Russians are blocked at US border, Ukrainians are admitted - Yahoo News
content:
1. Russians are blocked at US border, Ukrainians are admitted  Yahoo News
  2. Refugees Fleeing Ukraine join crowded border line for asylum seekers  KPBS Public Media
  3. Russian migrants told to vacate area just south of border crossing in Tijuana  ABC27
  4. War in Ukraine | Ukrainians can be considered for asylum despite COVID policy  CBS 8 San Diego
  5. Couple Escapes Ukraine, Makes it to San Diego After Difficult Journey  NBC San Diego
description: About three dozen would-be asylum seekers from Russia found themselves blocked from entering the U.S. on Friday while a group of Ukrainians flashed passports and were escorted across the border.  The scene reflected a quiet but unmistakable shift in the differing treatment of Russians and Ukrainians who enter Mexico as tourists and fly to Tijuana, hoping to enter the U.S. for a chance at asylum.  The Russians — 34 as of Friday — had been camped several days at the busiest U.S border crossing with Mexico, two days after city of Tijuana officials gently urged them to leave.
